title: Palak 🍃 Paneer 😋|Spinach Cottage Cheese Gravy Curry | Side Dish
content:
Side dish: Palak 🍃 Paneer Servings: 4 Duration: 40 minutes Palak paneer is a dazzling side dish filled with paneer cubes, flavored butter and juicy spinach gravy. It made by  grounded ginger-garlic, onion, tomato, spinach paste is the main base to the dish. I love to have spinach in anyway and I would like to share those delicious recipes which I have been introduced earlier, just recall those healthy & delicious dishes. They are
  • Palak Paratha | Spinach flat bread
  • Palak Mutter Gravy
  • Spinach peas 🌱 Pulao 🍚
  • Spinach Pesto Pasta | Italian Food
  • Palakura Pappu 🌿| South Indian Recipe
Click 👉 Health benefits of spinach 🌱 Let’s start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Spinach - 120 gms - washed & chopped
  • Paneer - chopped - 16 cubes
  • Green chillies - 2 - slits
  • Whole Cashew Nuts -10 - soaked in water for 15 minutes
  • Red Onion - 1 medium sized- 1/2 Diced 1/2 finely chopped
  • Tomato 🍅- 1 - Diced
  • Cumin seeds -1 tsp
  • Bay leaf 🍃- 1 - fresh
  • Ginger - 1 Tb sp - chopped
  • Garlic - Peeled off -chopped - 1 Tb sp
  • Butter - 3 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin Powder - 2 tsp
  • Coriander Powder - 2 tsp
  • Curd or yogurt - 2 Tb sp ( Whisked )
  • Water - 500 ml ( aaprox)
Procedure: Fried paneer:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add 1 Tb sp butter & fry paneer till they turn brown color
  • Take out in a bowl & keep aside
Palak/ Spinach Paste:
  • In the same pan, add butter (1 Tb sp )
  • Add chopped ginger, garlic , onion and tomato 🍅
  • Saute 2-3 minutes or till they become translucent
  • Then add spinach, Saute a minute and turn off heat
  • Take out in a bowl and let it become cool down
  • Add in blender along with soaked cashew nuts and 500 ml water
  • Blend it into smooth paste and keep it aside
Process of making palak - Paneer Gravy:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat, add butter (let it melt)
  • Add in bay leaf, cumin seeds, green chillies and finely chopped onion
  • Saute 2 minutes and add blended paste
  • Combine well, Cook 5 minutes and add salt, turmeric powder, red chilly powder & Garam masala powder
  • Mix well and let it cook more 5 minutes.
  • Next add fried paneer & curd, mix well and cook more 5 minutes
  • Turn off heat
  • Garnish with crumbled paneer ( optional) and serve with roti or steamed rice 🍚
  • Happy Cooking 🙂 & Have a blissful day 🍇
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to your preference
  • You can also add blanched spinach, Instead of sautéed spinach use ( How to blanch spinach 🍃( 👈click this link) )
  • If you wish, Add oil or ghee Instead of Butter
  • While serving, just drizzle some fresh lemon juice ( if you like so )
